metadata.synopsis: After the act 2 epilogue, the party comments on the state of the Shadow Curse before leaving for Baldur's Gate.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use "oe SCE_SetupDebrief" or use the debugbook to go to act 2 region "Epilogue".- Enter the trigger S_SCE_PartyVB_CurseStateComment_Trigger_fa7ca051-347b-4719-91ba-c60330e355f5 on the way to the road to Baldur's Gate near the army campsite.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The shadow curse will soon be forgotten, thanks to us.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Lady Shar's embrace holds strong. She will be pleased, no doubt.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: The shadow curse still taints the land. Perhaps we could have lifted it, had we tried.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Now these lands are free of Shar. I hope I can say the same of myself, soon enough.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: The shadow curse persists. A shame we could not lift it... but we have to move on.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Lady Shar's embrace has been lifted from these lands. A necessary sacrifice, to stop that traitor, Thorm.
